----- Original Message -----
From: John F Vanden Bosch Jr <jfvbjr@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, October 03, 1999 11:55 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 96

> If Sniffledoo Copperheart does have some info that we all have been
looking
> for I say let him speak.

uhm, if he has the info, why would he start out his message saying he was
here to share some info he found, but then at the end say that he was going
to check it out himself before he reveals what he found?

I think this list needs to be moderated to cut out the bs.
